abstract: Unilever’s $3.7 billion purchase of Alberto Culver marks the official deal debut of Byron D. Trott, the former Goldman Sachs partner widely known as Warren Buffett’s favorite banker.
snippet: Unilever’s $3.7 billion purchase of Alberto Culver marks the official deal debut of Byron D. Trott, the former Goldman Sachs partner widely known as Warren Buffett’s favorite banker.
lead_paragraph: Behold the first official deal brokered by Byron D. Trott’s new firm.

headline.main: Buffett’s Banker Pulls His First Independent Deal

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
